programme.title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E15, Thirty-two years after the killing of University of Michigan law student Jane Mixer, police use DNA found on her pantyhose to finally track down the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E21, Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E22, The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: The Black Dahlia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S06E06, Bill Kurtis examines one of the most infamous cold cases in Los Angeles history.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S09E02, The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: Devil At The Door
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E02, When 36-year-old computer programmer Lisa Valdez fails to show up for work, her apartment manager finds her brutally murdered. Detectives ask, could she be the victim of a brutal serial killer? Or was Lisa murdered by someone she knew?

programme.title: Missing in Altoona
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E03, When Sherry Leighty goes missing in 1999, her family is left wondering how a dedicated mother of three could vanish without a trace. A decade later, the cold case heats up when Sherry's sister launches a social media campaign.

programme.title: The School Teacher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E04, When 25-year-old school teacher Christy Mirack is found murdered in her apartment in 1992, there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: The Heartland Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E05, In the 1980s, a suspected serial killer preyed on women in small towns located on the banks of the Mississippi River until the murders abruptly ceased and went unsolved.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: Love and Hate
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E07, Near what's known as the hanging tree, the mutilated body of Timothy Coggins is found in late 1983. The investigation is thwarted and the case freezes for over 30 years, until a newly elected sheriff vows to bring the killers to justice.

programme.title: Ice Cold in Denver
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E08, On a bitter morning in 1980, radio intern Helene Pruszynski is found brutalized in a snowy field. After 37 years of fruitless leads, investigators tap into a genealogy website that gives them a lead.

programme.title: Murder by Moonlight
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E09, Easter Sunday of 1992, the body of missing woman Lisa Ziegert is found in a field. The investigation yields hundreds of leads but no true suspect. After more than two decades on ice, the case is revived.

programme.title: Suspicious Minds
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E10, In 1984, a 15-year-old girl is found murdered in her grandparents' home. For decades, a stalled investigation only fuels the town rumor mill, pointing an accusing finger at her 13-year-old sister.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.
Film Crew The Giant of Marathon, 20071009070000 +0000, The Film Crew rip apart B-Movie legend Steve Reeves and The Giant of Marathon.
MST3K: Cave Dwellers, 19910531070000 +0000, Wise ruler Akronas (aka “The Great One”) is the keeper of an incredibly powerful but potentially deadly device.
Film Crew: Hollywood After Dark, 20070710070000 +0000, The Film Crew gives a commentary track to Walk the Angry Beach, aka Hollywood After Dark, featuring Rue McClanahan as a stripper.
Film Crew: Killers From Space, 20070807070000 +0000, Former Mystery Science Theater 3000 crew rip apart Killers from Space.
MST3K: Gunslinger, 19931009000000 +0000, The widow of a murdered sheriff attempts to clean up the crime in her small town with help from the man hired to kill her.

MST3K: The Day The Earth Froze, 19930116000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots learn the ins and outs of the circus in the short Here Comes the Circus (1946) and then try to make sense of the Nordic fairy tale film The Day the Earth Froze (1959).
Film Crew: The Wild Women of Wongo, 20070911070000 +0000, Bob Honcho orders the Film Crew to provide a commentary track for the bizarre prehistoric adventure film, The Wild Women of Wongo (1958).

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: Big Changes
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E15, Part three of the complete history of MST3K takes a look at the changes the series underwent throughout the course of its run, including the host and network shifts.

MST3K: Fugitive Alien, 19910817000000 +0000, Movie constructed from two episodes of a Japanese television show. An alien marauder becomes a fugitive from his planet Valnar's Star, then joins the Earth spaceship Bacchus 3 to fight against his former masters.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: Big Changes
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E15, Part three of the complete history of MST3K takes a look at the changes the series underwent throughout the course of its run, including the host and network shifts.

MST3K: Gamera, 19910608000000 +0000, A giant mutated turtle wakes from eons of slumber and attacks Japan in Gamera: The Giant Monster (1965). The Bots create their own beauty salon and are treated to a visit from Gamera himself.

Ellen Foster, 19971214000000 +0000, An 11 year old girl is left an orphan when her mother commits suicide and her abusive, alcoholic father drinks himself to death. Stars Jena Malone, Julie Harris and Debra Monk. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.
Smart Cookies, 20120818000000 +0000, A high-maintenance realtor forced to do community service must lead a group of hopeless girl scouts in the regional cookie drive competition.

So You Said Yes, 20150207000000 +0000, A woman who avoids relationships opens a vintage bridal shop, and goes head-to-head with the snobbish owner of the town's classical bridal shop-only to find out her rival is the mother of her new boyfriend.

All Yours, 20160402000000 +0000, Cass, a high-powered attorney and single mother of two, is on the hunt for a new nanny after her precocious kids ran off the last one. Stars Nicollette Sheridan, Dan Payne and Jayne Eastwood.

A Way Back Home, 20130601000000 +0000, When a young musician returns to his hometown at Christmastime, he repairs old wounds and learns the power of forgiveness. Inspired by the paintings of Norman Rockwell. Stars Danny Glover, Austin Stowell and Kayla Ewell.

A Tale of Two Cities, 19801202000000 +0000, Based on Charles Dickens' classic, two identical men (both played by Chris Sarandon) - one from England and one from France - fall for the same woman during the height of the French Revolution.

A Way Back Home, 20130601000000 +0000, When a young musician returns to his hometown at Christmastime, he repairs old wounds and learns the power of forgiveness. Inspired by the paintings of Norman Rockwell. Stars Danny Glover, Austin Stowell and Kayla Ewell.

programme.title: Starting Over... Again
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E01, Hallmark Original Series. Like mother, like daughter!

programme.title: Running Scared
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E02, Hallmark Original Series. Middleton's Heritage Festival gets everyone in town talking.

programme.title: Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E03, Hallmark Original Series. Trouble is brewing after Cassie's mystery guest Ashley goes missing.

programme.title: Poisoning The Well
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E07, While on the planet Hoff, Dr. Beckett strives to help the Hoffans who are working on a vaccine against the Wraith. Despite the advice against taking the vaccine due to the threat of violence and high death rate, the Hoffans take the risk.

programme.title: Underground
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E08, The team visit the Genii, a peaceful farming community, with the goal of trading for food to allow the team to continue to survive. Things take a turn, however when they discover that the Genii are planning a massive attack against the Wraith.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E09, Upon arriving at a new planet, M5S-224, the team discovers that they can gate back to Earth. The team sets out, with the intention of returning thanks to a new hyperdrive. But when the engines suddenly explode, the team deals with a new situation.

programme.title: The Storm
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E10, Sheppard and Teyla discover that a massive storm is approaching the city. The team must evacuate the city, and the Manarians offer to give them shelter. As they work to figure out a way to power up the shield, the city is invaded by the Genii.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E11, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) plays a dangerous game of cat and mouse as he attempts to regain control of Atlantis from the Genii, who have taken the city along with Weir (Torri Higginson) and McKay (David Hewlett) hostage.

programme.title: The Defiant One
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E12, Sheppard and McKay set out, along with two scientists, to explore when they stumble upon a distress beacon coming from a Wraith ship. When they move to investigate, they discover that the ship has been sending out it's SOS signal for 10,000 years.

programme.title: Common Descent
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E17, Destiny discovers the survivors of an interplanetary expedition who claim their civilization, Novus, was founded two thousand years earlier by Destiny’s crew. Suddenly, they are attacked by the Drones who have discovered a way to track Destiny.

programme.title: Epilogue
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E18, Returning the settlers to their home planet Novus, the Destiny crew discover the planet has been abandoned and is on the verge of seismic destruction. While pouring through an underground archive, the crew learns of the true origins of Novus.

programme.title: Blockade
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E19, When Destiny’s attempt to recharge in a star is foiled by attacking drones, Eli suggests a risky plan to recharge in a super-hot blue giant…a star so hot it could destroy the ship…unless someone stays aboard and keeps the ship under manual control.

programme.title: Gauntlet
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E20, After a battle, Destiny’s only option for survival is a jump to the next galaxy. Crew members return to Earth to say what may be their final farewells before embarking on their journey. But a risky stop may put the entire plan in jeopardy.

programme.title: Point Of No Return
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E11, When a quirky conspiracy theorist contacts SG-1 claiming to know classified information about the Stargate, at first they think he's bluffing. But when they investigate his wild claims, they realize he's a lot closer to the truth than they thought.

programme.title: Tangent
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E12, When O'Neill and Teal'c take an SGC-modified Goa'uld glider out for a test flight, they lose control and are sucked into outer space by a Goa'uld tracking device. It's up to the team to rescue them, before they run out oxygen and life support.

programme.title: The Curse
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E13, When Daniel Jackson returns to Chicago to attend the funeral of his mentor, a celebrated archaeologist, he soon realizes that the death is mysteriously connected to the recent discovery of a 10,000-year-old Egyptian artifact that might be cursed.

programme.title: The Serpent's Venom
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E14, SG-1 travels to a remote interplanetary minefield to sabotage a hazardous alliance between two powerful Goa'uld System Lords. But their mission becomes far more dangerous when they realize Teal'c has been captured by one of the Lords.

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E15, When SGC commander Gen. Hammond steps down saying he's too old for the job, SG-1 suspects foul play. When a hard-nosed new general steps in to replace him and splits up SG-1, they vow to solve the mystery and get their beloved General back.

Stargate SG-1, S04E16, A decade in the future, Earth's alliance with a highly intelligent race of aliens has rendered SGC obsolete. But when Carter, now married to an ambassador, uncovers a terrifying secret, she must reassemble SG-1 to send an urgent message to the past.

programme.title: Absolute Power
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E17, When a chosen boy is brought to SGC, he sends a telepathic message, causing Daniel's personality to undergo disturbing changes. Will the rest of SG-1 be able to solve the mystery of the boy's origin before he becomes a power-hungry warmonger?

programme.title: Pilot Parts 1 and 2
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E001, Twins Brandon and Brenda Walsh experience a very special kind of culture shock when they move from Minnesota to Beverly Hills and begin their new lives at West Beverly High.

programme.title: The Green Room
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E002, Brandon meets Dylan McKay, a brooding classmate. As they become friends, Brandon learns that Dylan's bad-boy act masks a hidden life that few people ever see.

programme.title: Every Dream Has Its Price
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E003, Brenda shops with Kelly and Tiffany and wishes she had their kind of money.

programme.title: The First Time
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E004, Brandon is visited by his ex-girlfriend Sheryl but, when she meets Dylan, she's quickly star-struck by his money and glamor.

programme.title: One on One
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E005, When Brandon tries out for the basketball team, he's angered to learn that his main rival is from another district.

programme.title: Higher Education
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E006, An unreasonable teacher makes Brandon's life miserable by giving him no grade higher than a C.

programme.title: Perfect Mom
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E007, "Delusions of glamour" overcome Brenda when she meets Kelly's beautiful mother Jackie, a former model.

programme.title: Seventeen Year Itch
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E008, The Walsh parents examine their relationship while Brenda and Brandon examine theirs, as they get involved in a UCLA study on twins.

programme.title: The Gentle Art Of Listening
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E009, Sympathy and responsibility are at odds when Brenda volunteers for a teen crisis hotline.

programme.title: Isn't It Romantic?
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E010, The chemistry between Brenda and Dylan starts to heat up when Brenda accidentally catches him in the shower, then comforts him after he fights with his father.

programme.title: B.Y.O.B.
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E011, Both Walsh twins face the temptation to drink alcohol when their peers are doing it all around them.

programme.title: One Man and a Baby
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E012, Brandon gets an unexpected taste of fatherhood when he asks his classmate Melissa for a date-then has to baby-sit her infant son while she has a college interview.

programme.title: Slumber Party
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E013, Pillow talk threatens to destroy Brenda's sleep-over as all the girls share their deepest secrets, with unexpected results.

programme.title: East Side Story
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E014, The Walsh's agree to let their maid's niece, Carla, use their address to enroll at West Beverly.

programme.title: Palm Springs Weekend
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E015, A weekend in Palm Springs goes awry when David invites Steve, Kelly and Donna to join him at his grandparents' house while they're away on a cruise-but he gets the dates confused, and they're still there.

programme.title: Fame Is Where You Find It
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E016, Brandon is "discovered" when he's out roller-blading, landing a role as an emergency extra on a big TV show.

programme.title: Stand (Up) and Deliver
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E017, Brenda's had it with home life and West Beverly and decides to leave both for the real world.

programme.title: Twin Car Trauma/Dog Saves Cop
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E374, A 3-year old left in a car causes a serious accident. A Sheriff's Deputy and his K-9 partner search for a burglary suspect.

programme.title: Asthma/Double Football Player
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E193, A man suffers a severe asthma attack. The tragic story of football star Jerry Anderson is told.

programme.title: Chemistry Hero/Fireman Down
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E222, A vial begins bubbling during a high school chemistry class. A firefighter is injured and trapped when a 500 lb. building façade collapses directly on top of him.

programme.title: Alpine Ski/Falling Glass
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E263, William Shatner hosts re-enactments of real rescues.

programme.title: French Skydiver/Woodshop
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E261, A skydiver's parachute strap gets snagged and she is dangling underneath the plane.

programme.title: Russia/Potty Peril
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E282, A boy is severely burned when his clothes catch fire. A two-year-old is trapped in an unexpected place in her home.

programme.title: Security Bar/BB Gun Blast
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E227, A family is awakened by their house on fire, but the father and daughter are trapped by security bars over the bedroom window. A woman witnesses her 6-year-old shot by a bee gun blast.

programme.title: Carbon Monoxide/Don’t Answer Door
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E304, A mysterious illness strikes a Colorado family. A woman calls 911 when she hears a prowler in the house.

programme.title: Peeved Preschooler/Maryland Med
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E228, A preschooler runs away from grandma's house but doesn’t know her number when he wants to go home. Rescue 911 follows Dr. Tom S at Pittsburgh Presbyterian University Hospital.

programme.title: Trunk Trapped Tot/Nail Gun Heart
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E250, A 4-year-old is trapped in an unusual place. A man losses his balance on a scaffold and accidentally shoots a coworker in the chest with a nail gun.

programme.title: Teen Gun/French Parasailing
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E112, Teen uses the wrong bullet cause the gun to explode/Parasailer cant reach landing site and gets tangled.

programme.title: Phoenix Flood/Babysitter Prowler
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E116, Flash flood surrounds elderly couple in pick up truck/10 yr. old babysitter calls 911 for a stranger banging on the door.

programme.title: Pick Up Truck/Butane Huffing
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E360, Two children are hurt when a truck crashes into a convenience store. A 15-year old boy passes out after inhaling butane.

programme.title: Placenta/Electrocuted Teen
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E157, A mom diagnosed with placenta previa goes into labor. A 15-year-old is unconscious after installing a motor in the water

programme.title: Ski Heart Puncture/Insulin Dad
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E241, A ski instructor falls and slides down a mountain into a tree. 6-year-old calls 911 when her diabetic father goes into insulin shock.

programme.title: River Tubing/Mailman Save
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E103, River tubing accident / 2 year old behind the wheel of an out of control car

programme.title: Ex RN Son/Sparkletts Dalmation
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E202, A nurse witnesses and goes to help an accident. A pet Dalmatian slips 80 feet down into a storm drain.

programme.title: Bumber Baby/Dallas Cop Down
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E301, A two-year-old is missing after the father drives away in a truck. A police officer is shot while investigating a suspicious person.

programme.title: Blind Hero/Babysitter Down

Cape Cod Christmas, 20181101000000 +0000, When a children's author hosts one last Christmas dinner with her disagreeable siblings before they sell the family house, she reunites with her childhood sweetheart who helps her find a way to keep the home she loves so dearly.
Back to Christmas, 20131231000000 +0000, Ali wakes realizing she's reliving a past Christmas allowing her to change the path of her love life with her ex or with someone entirely unexpected!
A Royal Christmas Engagement, 20201129000000 +0000, While disguised as a commoner, a Prince falls in love with an advertising executive during the Christmas season.

A Royal Christmas Ball, 20151029000000 +0000, It's a fairy tale come true for Allison, and her daughter, Lily, when Lily's estranged father, Charles, makes a visit to California. Charles may have come on official business, but his real mission is to find Allison and make amends for lost time.

A Royal Christmas on Ice, 20221105000000 +0000, Looking to escape his Royal life, a dashing prince comes to the United States to start a business in a small town in upstate New York and winds up falling for a former Olympic ice skater.

Last Chance For Christmas, 20151206000000 +0000, When Prancer injures his hoof, Santa's handsome but beleaguered stable master John must rush off to Alaska to find a substitute reindeer in order to save Christmas.

Waking Up to Christmas, 20230101000000 +0000, On the verge of a massive deadline, a cynical workaholic is zapped by faulty Christmas lights while stranded in a small Colorado town and finds herself cast as the lead in an over-the-top Hallmark-style holiday movie.
A Christmas Cruise, 20170101000000 +0000, When her best friend invites her along on a holiday-themed sail, an aspiring novelist unexpectedly finds the love of her life onboard.
A Snow White Christmas, 20180101000000 +0000, With the help of seven quirky friends, Blanca Snow must use the power of true love to overcome her evil stepmother from ruining Christmas.

The Twelve Days of Christmas Eve, 20041207000000 +0000, Calvin Carter, a successful business executive, has it all but neglects those closest to him. On Christmas Eve, all that changes when the sign on his office building falls on him.

Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla, 20021214000000 +0000, After four years of scrupulous preparation under the prime minister, a new invincible robot, Mechagodzilla, has now reached completion, armed with various weapons, including the most powerful gun in history.

Godzilla: Tokyo S.O.S., 20041214000000 +0000, Mechagodzilla, the superior-armed, state-of-the-art, all-robot version of Godzilla, is undergoing repairs after his devastating battle against the world's monsters.

Godzilla: Final Wars, 20051213000000 +0000, Earth has been relatively peaceful since Godzilla was successfully buried deep in ice beneath the South Pole. Then - sometime a few years hence-several of his old nemeses return to wreak havoc on cities worldwide.

Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla 2, 19931211000000 +0000, Mechagodzilla® is the ultimate in Godzilla®-busting weaponry. Fueled by a nuclear reactor and sheathed in a synthetic diamond shield, the mammoth metal robot is Japan's greatest hope for ending Godzilla®'s reign of terror.

Godzilla vs. Spacegodzilla, 19941210000000 +0000, Japan's Counter G Bureau enters the New Age with Project T, in which a telepathic amplifier is implanted in Godzilla's brain to bring the giant monster under control. In a faraway galaxy, the mutant Space Godzilla turns its evil eyes toward earth!

Godzilla vs. Destoroyah, 19951209000000 +0000, With a super-charged blast from his nuclear past, a new Godzilla® emerges from his own ashes, radioactive and ready to take on Tokyo! The great lizard's nuclear energy is increasing by the minute, and a monster meltdown threatens to vaporize the planet.

Rebirth of Mothra, 19961214000000 +0000, When the three-headed Death Ghidorah, an even fiercer cousin of King Ghidorah, begins to destroy the forests of Japan, Mothra, one of Godzilla's longtime allies (and sometimes foe), leaves her island paradise to help save them.

Rebirth of Mothra 2, 19971213000000 +0000, Two young kids inadvertently unleash a giant sea creature which is strengthened from the abundance of modern-day pollution. Mothra's keepers, the tiny twins Moll and Lora, quickly rouse the gentle giant in order to combat this latest threat to peace.

programme.title: Dangerous Games
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E04, Leigh goes hang gliding with Sam Parks, a daredevil pilot who puts her life in danger. Things go horribly wrong when Kekoa's cousin, Nani, parties on a boat with drunken frat boys and ends up alone in the ocean.

programme.title: Stone Cold
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E05, A plane carrying a donor's heart crashes, and it’s up to Jason to make a desperate dive to retrieve the heart before the patient dies. Two hooligans steal a car and end up trapped underwater. Jenna tries to get Leigh to turn against Sean.

programme.title: Broken Promises
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E06, To avoid jail, Danny joins Team Baywatch. Leigh doesn't trust him. Kekoa battles her father over her lifeguard career and moves out. JD, Zack, and Jason hustle two gorgeous women who turn out to be con artists who turn the tables on them.

programme.title: Dream Girl
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E07, Jenna convinces ruthless Councilman McKenna to close the Training Center. Sean suspends Zack after he severely injures JD during a rescue. Kekoa expresses her deep love for JD – but to Leigh! Zack sees a ghostly woman from his dreams.

programme.title: The Cage
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E08, Sean confronts a "shark tour" operator dangerously dumping chum to lure sharks. A tourist who wants to be a hero to impress his son keeps interfering with Jason's rescues. JD and Kekoa try to keep their passionate relationship a secret.

programme.title: Ben
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E09, Sean's incredible guilt after a surfing accident leads to a crisis of faith. Zack has to choose between loyalty to his Baywatch teammates and his competitive ambitions.

programme.title: Ties that Bind
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E10, Zack is devastated when Sean promotes Carrie instead of him. Zack and Jason befriend a man and his teenage daughter who harbor a dangerous secret. Zack supplies a boat to escape to Maui, but disaster strikes before they get there.

programme.title: Black Widow
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E11, Leigh suspects Sasha, an attractive tourist, of murdering her husband. Betraying Leigh, Jason seduces Sasha with shocking results! Sean is shocked when he discovers the truth about his ex-wife's visit to Hawaii.

programme.title: Ex-Files
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E12, A series of fake rescue calls puts Sean, Jenna and Zack’s lives in danger. Jenna replaces Councilman McKenna, giving her the power to shut down the Training Center! JD tries to get Kekoa’s father to bless their relationship.

programme.title: The Stalker
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E13, Carrie rescues a spearfisherman who starts obsessively stalking her. Sean, Jason, and Zack save her from his deadly pursuit, but can Carrie feel safe saving strangers again? Sean is jealous of Sam dating Leigh, but Leigh has doubts about Sam.

programme.title: Father Faust
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E14, Baywatch faces two bizarre lawsuits. Kekoa’s father wants her to break up with JD and quit lifeguarding. Zack runs the new Junior Lifeguards program. A government Investigation puts Sean’s job and the future of the Training Center in jeopardy.

programme.title: Good Man in a Storm
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E15, A hurricane hits Hawaii. Sean and Jenna get trapped in a WWII bunker and must put their hatred aside and work together to escape. Zack is trapped in headquarters with a thrill-seeking reporter that puts their lives in danger to get her story.

programme.title: My Father the Hero
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E16, Jenna invests all her money with an investment banker who turns out to be a con man. Derek Hart is the kind of man JD wishes he was. But when Derek jumps off a cliff, JD and Jason dive in to save his life, in more ways than one!

programme.title: Boiling Point
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E17, Zack corrupts the headquarters’ computer system forcing everyone to work in the Dark Ages. Sean is freaked because a major donor is about to arrive in the midst of chaos. Jason saves Brit from her ex.

programme.title: The Return of Jessie
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E18, Kekoa is devastated when Jessie tells JD that he’s the father of her child. A rescued bodyboarder is paralyzed. Sean has a romantic encounter with a beautiful, woman he thinks might really be Pele, the goddess fire.

programme.title: Trapped
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E19, Investigating toxic dumping, Sean and Leigh end up chained inside a chamber slowly filling with toxic seawater. Can Sam get them out in time? To raise money, Jason and Zack have to hula dance in grass skirts in front of a lot of women.

programme.title: Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E20, Leigh takes over at Baywatch while Sean, Jason, and Zack go to compete in a 12-mile race of natural obstacles. Jessie’s presence at the race creates turmoil. Leigh and Jenna pretend to be lesbian lovers.
